original_text: For we stretch not ourselves beyond our measure, as though we reached not unto you: for we are come as far as to you also in preaching the gospel of Christ:
korean_text: 우리가 너희에게 미치지 못할 자로서 스스로 지나쳐 나아간 것이 아니요 그리스도의 복음으로 너희에게까지 이른 것이라

sentences.original_text: For we stretch not ourselves beyond our measure
as though we reached not unto you
sentences.korean_translation: 마치 우리가 당신께 이르지 못한 것처럼

sentences.original_text: for we are come as far as to you also
in preaching the gospel of Christ
